summary: This mod is Alucard\'s clothes from Castlevania Memories, edited to fit a player better than an NPC. It supports all the playable races and has some light armor stats. You can now be like Lord Alucard from the Abandoned Castle.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is Alucard\'s clothes from Castlevania Memories, edited to fit a player better than an NPC. It supports all the playable races and has some light armor stats. You can buy it from Radiant Raiment in Solitude.

=============================================
Update:
=============================================

Now available with a red, a green and the original black cape.

=============================================

Note that it\'s an outfit that doesn\'t support gloves.

You can see this video to get a better idea as well, by MajorMarris:

[youtube]rOlnFBvYRHU[/youtube]

-Installation:
Just auto download it with the NMM. It should go to the right direction.

-Uninstalling:
Delete the AlucardClothes.esp and bsa, bsl from your Skyrim data folder or auto delete/deactivate from the NMM.

My other mods for Skyrim:

Castlevania Abandoned Castle-demo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19869

Castlevania Memories First Episode (Where Alucard plays as a companion)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23428

Pirates of the Pacific: The Protection of the Elder Scrolls (Used the clothes in alternate colours for imperial clothes)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29443
author: LordKarnak
